seo: noVNC,CVE-2017-18635,DOM XSS漏洞,远程代码执行
summary: 该插件用于检测noVNC应用中存在CVE-2017-18635的DOM型XSS漏洞，远程攻击者可通过注入恶意HTML代码到状态字段中进行攻击。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect the DOM XSS vulnerability (CVE-2017-18635) in noVNC applications. Remote attackers can inject malicious HTML into the status field to perform an attack.
